reviews.customers_say: Customers find this cardigan lightweight and perfect for layering, with a timeless style that can be dressed up or down.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and lightweight without feeling flimsy- perfect for summer evenings
items.body: I wasn’t expecting to love this as much as I do, but become one of my wardrobe favorites. The fabric blend (cotton, modal, and polyester) makes it incredibly soft and lightweight without feeling flimsy — ideal for those of us who run warm or deal with temperature swings. The cut is flattering —it drapes nicely, feels breathable, and doesn’t cling in awkward places. I especially appreciate that it’s machine washable and dries flat quickly, so it’s easy to care for. If you want something cozy without overheating, especially for summer evenings, this is perfect. It’s a solid “grab and go” piece for any season, and at this price, it feels like a small luxury that makes everyday comfort a little easier. Read more
items.author: HGinSanFrancisco

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Quality for Price! Fit and fabric are perfect for me!
items.body: I was pleasantly surprised that this sweater was just the right weight and fit! It is lightweight for Florida but nice for cool mornings and air conditioning. It is wrinkle resistant and does not lose its shape in wearing all day. I ordered a large and that fit great. I'm 5'5" weighing about 150. Loved the rich burgundy wine color for fall and winter. A great buy! Read more
items.author: S. Williams

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice black summer sweater
items.body: this is very lightweight sweater without buttons. The actual sweater is longer than it was pictured. I’m 5 foot four and it goes down to my knee, which is not what I was looking for. It’s a flattering fit and very lightweight. Good quality and reasonable Read more
items.author: Christine

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best cardigan ever!!
items.body: I love this cardigan! It is lightweight and so comfortable. It can be dressed up or down. It washes and dries very well. I love the length and how it fits. It’s my favorite!! Read more
items.author: aandc

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great sweater for all year if you live in the south or as a transitional if you live in the north.
items.body: I was looking for a really light-weight sweater, to keep the chill of the A/C from turning me into a popsicle when we go out for dinner. This is perfect for my needs. I bought a size large because I wanted a loose comfy fit. I'm 5'4", 130# and this fit beautifully. It comes down to 4" above my knee, the sleeves were a perfect fit with nice long 2.5" cuffs. There are no buttons or pockets drag the look down. The bottom edge ribbing is 4.25", as are the side slits. I bought the Oatmeal heather, hoping for a neutral shade. This fits that category, too. When I took it out of the bag it was pretty wrinkled, but after hanging for less than an hour it was good to go. I cannot think of anything bad to say about this sweater. At half cotton, half man made fiber, I do not foresee any problems with washing it. I don't plan on putting it in the dryer, though. I do plan on buy some more colors in the near future. Read more
items.author: Sherry Cole

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars I want a new Sweater its not even 2 months old yet!!!!
items.body: I just bought this sweater on September 5th of this year and I really love the weight of it its nice and light! Love the length and variety of colors.( I have 5 colors) I am so disappointed, I washed my navy sweater one time and it's already coming apart. I went to see if I could return it and it turns out that the window for returning it closed on October 5th. Come on Amazon, I just want a new navy sweater, I love my sweater but I can't wear it if it has holes. Please. Send me a new one. Read more
items.author: debi hallowell

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent- Purchased Several Colors!
items.body: Have purchased several of these cardigans in different colors. Previous purchases of this cardi- sized down and purchased another color. The tan I did not find flattering on my skin tone- I am a cool olive tone and the camel has too much yellow undertones and made my skin look sallow. I returned and purchased a replacement of the wine color and a size down. Much better! The fabric is light, good for somewhat cool weather and could be worn to work dressed up or perfect for running errands. It does possess a put together look if you pair it with a nice t-shirt or top underneath. My latest charcoal grey is nice, but the fabric texture feels a bit different than the others, not as soft but it is still a great sweater. Read more
items.author: Kristin

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light weight and cozy!
items.body: Love it! Fits true to size. Longer length like I like. Light weight and cozy. Happy with purchase. See why other reviewers went back for more. No pockets, but soft. Read more
items.author: Starfish

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Chestnut Brown Heather, Gold, Indigo Blue Heather, Camel Heather, Light Grey Heather, Burgundy, Black, Sage Green Heather, Charcoal Tiger Print, Dark Red, Dark Green, Olive, Red, Oatmeal Heather. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
